summary: And that’s chapter 3 up! Going North is still going strong with the feedback and it makes me giddy every time I check my...
body:
And that’s chapter 3 up! Going North is still going strong with the feedback and it makes me giddy every time I check my statistics. Thank you so much for your great response! Again, if you want to read it on Wattpad, you can do so here.

Chapter summary:

Bran and Jon run into some trouble on their way to the Wall.

summary: the writers really on crack if they think Tyrion’s little speech about Bran is gonna convince me that kid who has never ruled a...
body: the writers really on crack if they think Tyrion’s little speech about Bran is gonna convince me that kid who has never ruled a day in his life and is literally incapable of feel empathy for humanity would be a better ruler then Sansa, who is loved by everyone she rules and has already put in the hours to prove she’d be the best goddamn queen the 7 kingdoms could ever hope for

blog.name: brrahbrrahcharacterimagines
blog.title: Stay Gold
blog.description: Requests are all currently OPEN! This includes imagines, headcanons, and NSFW alphabets (plus most anything else you guys can think of)! I write for a lot of fandoms, so don't be afraid to ask!

summary: The Perfect Size (Bran Stark x Reader)
title: The Perfect Size (Bran Stark x Reader)
body:
MASTERLIST

Pairing: Bran Stark x Plus Size!Reader

Word Count: 1031

Warnings: A lot of angst in terms of self-doubt

Request: Hey, can you do Bran falling in love with a plus size girl. Also I love your blog! 💝 -(Anon)

A/N: I used the same image for my fic “My Exception” but these two fics are not related FYI

Their words echoed in your mind, threatening to drown you,

“She’s disgusting,” whispered of the ladies. 

“I know,” replied another, “does she ever stop eating?”

They must have thought that you were out of earshot, but you could hear them perfectly clearly. 

“Of course she doesn’t ever stop, why else would she be so fat?”

That was the last straw for you, tears flowing down your face as you made your way back to the room you shared with your husband Bran. With every step on the stones you felt like a huge monster, stomping around. You felt like you weighed so much that surely every footfall sounded like a tree falling in the forest. You sped up your pace, trying to get back to your chambers as quickly as you could. Every step bringing tears and making you long for the privacy of your room even more.

Thankfully for you Bran was away in some meeting; he wouldn’t be there when you felt so weak. You didn’t want him to see you that way. On top of seeing you as revolting, you didn’t need him seeing you as helpless.

You sat down on the edge of your bed with a sob. You had known that you weren’t exactly the thinnest girl around, but it never bothered you. At least, it never bothered you to the point it did today. Bran loved you unconditionally, and that is what mattered to you. But hearing the ladies of the court speak about you that way behind your back was devastating.

You had feared not fitting in at court, but once you married Bran all of your worries seemed to vanish. The ladies accepted you, and the lords respected you. But now, all of that security went up in smoke. You were filled with paranoia, afraid now that everybody in court thought the same of you.

Of course they do, you thought. I’m a fat pig.

The little voice in the back of your head wouldn’t stop running wild, throwing insults at yourself and hurling words that would hurt you the worst. From your spot in the bed you were suddenly very aware of how your stomach felt. The way that it would roll over itself, leaving creases in the fabric of your dress.

They were right. I really am disgusting.

You stood up, very aware of the way your thighs jiggled when you did so. Your thighs rubbed together as you walked, making the tears fall faster. You shed your beautiful gown, feeling unfit to wear such a gorgeous garment. As you took it off, you turned to face yourself in the mirror hanging on the wall of your room.

You saw your double chin which only got worse as you looked down to the rest of your body. Your upper arms reminded you of wings as they jiggled and jostled, only rivaled by your midsection. Your stomach seemed too big for your body, as if perhaps you had eaten a whole feast on your own. You looked through blurry eyes at your reflection as your eyes continued to water and let tears cascade down your cheeks. Your thighs were no better, looking like two sacks of potatoes covered in cellulite.

You felt like the most horrid woman in the world.

The door opened, startling you from your thoughts. You wiped furiously at your face in an attempt to dry it, scrambling to pull a blanket around your body so you were less exposed to the unknown intruder.

“Y/N? Darling?” Came a loving voice, that of your dear husband Bran. As he wheeled into the room and shut the door behind him, you saw his face drop. “What’s wrong?”

He took one look at you, desperately trying to hide your body even though you now knew it was only him. He didn’t need to use his greensight to know how you felt.

“Oh, Y/N,” he said sadly, reaching out to grab your hand. “Let go of the blanket.”

The tears began falling from your eyes again as you shook your head.

“And why not?”

“Because I’m repulsive,” you whispered. You let out a sob despite trying to hold it back, “I’m not thin and beautiful like the other ladies here in King’s Landing. I’m not the right size.”

Bran let out a small sigh before he responded. He reached out for your other hand, and you let him take it this time. The blanket fell to a pool at your feet and Bran took the opportunity to let go of your hands and caress your body.

“Y/N, you’re right.” He said, startling you and making your chest tighten as you wanted to scream. Noticing your reaction, he quickly continued. “You’re right that you aren’t thin, I mean. But that doesn’t mean that you’re repulsive.” You looked down to meet Bran’s big brown eyes, full of love and compassion. “I don’t understand how you could think that you aren’t the right size. You are the perfect size for me. I love you My Dear, you know that I do with all my heart.”

You bent down, allowing Bran to take you into his arms. 

“I love you too, Bran,” you told him through your tears. 

“And trust me,” continued Bran, “you won’t have to worry about people like that ever again.”

You gasped, pulling back to look at Bran. Had he looked into your past to see what had happened?

“Bran, you promised you would never invade my privacy like that!” You yelled.

“No, no, I didn’t do that at all Darling,” he assured you. “Ser Brienne heard what they were saying. I reckon she has been in a similar situation.”

You smiled sadly, knowing that he was right. You had become good friends with Brienne during your time in King’s Landing. You bonded over many things, one being the way you were viewed.

“They will have to leave the Red Keep by morning.” He revealed.

You let Bran pull you back into his arms, savoring the feeling of him holding you. If you fit so well in his arms, perhaps he was right. You were the perfect size for him.

A/N: I really liked this request! I hope I was able to do it justice for you. I have had body image issues myself for years, and although I may have changed the specific insecurities for this fic I poured my heart and soul into it. I really hope you enjoyed.

If you liked this, consider buying me a coffee –> Ko-Fi

You are the perfect size for me. I love you My Dear, you know that I do with all my heart.”

blog.name: a-daydreamers-stories
blog.description:
Headcanon and ship requests- OPEN One shots and imagine requests- OPEN  :) Masterlist- https://a-daydreamers-stories.tumblr.com/post/174713467551/masterlist
Samperv member.

summary: Could you do Bran Stark with a plus size female s/o?
question: Could you do Bran Stark with a plus size female s/o?
answer:
Bran Stark with Plus Size Female

-He honestly doesn’t care what you look like, he loves your personality

-But that doesn’t mean he doesn’t think you’re the most beautiful woman in the 7 kingdoms

-Because he does, he loves your body, mind, and soul

-When he knows you’re having a bad day he knows exactly how to make you feel better

-if you dont feel confident he showers you in compliments and takes extra care to show you how much he adores you

-if you are feeling down, he has your favorite food made and extra snuggling will happen

-if you’re upset, he will have whatever irritated you taken care of.

- He will always be there by your side, especially since you chose to be by his

blog.name: booksandhotchocolate
blog.title: A reader lives a thousand lives
blog.description:
★★★★★★★★★★ ★★★★★★★★★★

❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤

We don’t need to have just one favorite. We keep adding favorites. Our favorite book is always the book that speaks most directly to us at a particular stage in our lives. And our lives change. We have other favorites that give us what we most need at that particular time. But we never lose the old favorites. They’re always with us. We just sort of accumulate them.

(ノ°ο°)ノ THIS IS NOT A SPOILER FREE BLOG ✿◉‿◉✿

blog.name: nightqueendany
blog.title: The Daenerys Defense
blog.description: Hi, I'm Lauren. I'm a Santa Cruzian. Yes as in Banana Slugs. Yes, as in the tee-shirt John Travolta wears in Pulp Fiction. I'm a GOT fan. Daenerys stan. I try to be diplomatic but sometimes swear words come out. Deal with it.  Sideblog for asks: asknightqueendany.tumblr.com

summary: What was the point of Benjen telling Bran that he would be waiting for the Night King when he finally made it last the Wall and...
body:
What was the point of Benjen telling Bran that he would be waiting for the Night King when he finally made it last the Wall and into the world of men?

I mean, yeah, I guess Bran was waiting for him. But he didn’t do anything about it!

They led us to believe that Bran was actually important in the fight against the dead and would be key to defeating the Night King but his importance was actually to the realm of men and that he needed to be protected from the Night King??

Bullshit

summary: hey, i just wanted to say i really love your writing!^^ and if you have the time, i would like to request some bran headcanons:)...
question: hey, i just wanted to say i really love your writing!^^ and if you have the time, i would like to request some bran headcanons:) maybe it turns out he could have children afterall, and how he'd deal with a pregnant s/o?^^
answer:
this is the cutest thing ever ok

  • He’d be a fucking great father
  • And the most loving partner while you’re going trough pregnancy.
  • Sometimes he can’t be around you because of king duties but he sends Brienne to look after you.
  • Every night he likes to put his head over your pregnant tummy, talking to the baby
  • One of those nights the baby kicks for the first time!!!
  • Bran literally can’t handle happiness and sheds a few tears
  • “She heard me, Y/N!!!!”
  • “And how do you know it’s a she?”
  • “I… just know”
  • Sam told you to stay in bed, since you’re almost there and you need to be as relaxed as you can.
  • So Bran stays with you everytime he can, caressing your tummy and praising you
  • “You’re going to be the best mother, love”
  • “Pregnancy makes you look even more gorgeous”
  • when the water breaks everyone’s losing it
  • MOSTLY BRAN
  • HE’S ABOUT TO MEET HIS BABY
  • He holds your hand tightly when you start pushing
  • You feel like you’re about to pass out and look at Bran
  • He’s a crying mess and holds your hand
  • You deliver the baby
  • it’s a girl!!!!!!
  • BRAN CRIES AGAIN
  • The two of you staring with so much love at her, none of you believing how small and delicate she is
  • Bran caressing your hair as he kisses your forehead
  • “I can’t believe it”
  • “We need to send a raven to Winterfell” you giggle looking at him.

tags: i'm being positive because the whole fandom is negative
summary: am I allowed to absolutely love that Bran is King but also absolutely hate his council?
question: am I allowed to absolutely love that Bran is King but also absolutely hate his council?
answer: Absolutely. Davos, Brienne and even Tyrion (he sucks at battles but is good with administration except for when his privilege blinded him in Meereen) make sense but Bronn and Sam don’t. D&D don’t care about Bran which is why we spent a minute with Tyrion arranging the seats.

reblog.comment: Absolutely. Davos, Brienne and even Tyrion (he sucks at battles but is good with administration except for when his privilege blinded him in Meereen) make sense but Bronn and Sam don’t. D&D don’t care about Bran which is why we spent a minute with Tyrion arranging the seats.

summary:
Bran: You just have to play the hand you're dealt. 
Bran: Arya? That girl's an ace.
Bran: Jon is my king up my sleeve...
Bran:...
body:
Bran: You just have to play the hand you're dealt. 
Bran: Arya? That girl's an ace.
Bran: Jon is my king up my sleeve...
Bran: Lady Stoneheart is my old maid...
Bran: Meera is my queen. That's easy, give me a hard one.
Bran: Melisandre is the instruction card you throw away...
Bran: Sansa is a solid seven...
Bran: And yeah, Rickon is still a baby, so he's probably, like, a two? But you know, twos can be wild.
Bran: And I'm obviously the joker.

summary: Let me tell you, waking up to four comments and over 200 hits on Going North blew my mind. I’ve never gotten this big of a...
body:
Let me tell you, waking up to four comments and over 200 hits on Going North blew my mind. I’ve never gotten this big of a response on a story his quickly before and it’s absolutely amazing!!! Thanks you so much to everyone that read the story and left a comment, it put a huge smile on my face. The next chapter will be posted on the 19th of June, so please look forward to it!

Also, if you don’t know what this is about, you can read the story here.

summary: be careful with your fingers  Actually, just put that thing away Greyjoy, you’re not impressing anyone here...    I promised...

be careful with your fingers

Actually, just put that thing away Greyjoy, you’re not impressing anyone here…    I promised @felicimo to draw Theon some time ago, so here he is, cocky as ever and accompanied by some judgy Starklings. His clothes were designed after Viking fashion, but I took some liberties to make them more fancy.

summary: Do you have any headcanons for king bran? I just imagine him trolling his small council all the time and like judging them. Also...
question: Do you have any headcanons for king bran? I just imagine him trolling his small council all the time and like judging them. Also imagine him and sansa shading people through letters and keeping in touch and sharing fun stories (they always loved stories).
answer:
• bran solves many of the problems his kingdoms face by flying in ravens and directly talking to the people involved (yes he wargs into humans but it apparently isn’t bad in the got universe). sometimes he leaves some problems a little unresolved for his small council to deal with
  • bran really enjoys embarrassing bronn. every time bronn tells a story bran interjects adding details that bronn leaves out all while pretending not to understand why bronn’s annoyed. the others catch on to this and ‘egg’ bran on by asking him what really happened
  • bran’s favourite thing in the world is telling people ‘i’ve been expecting you’ and subtly implying he saw visions about the person visiting him just so that he can look surprised sometimes when he has visitors driving people crazy because they can’t tell what that means for them

  • bran’s favourite thing in the world is telling people ‘i’ve been expecting you’ and subtly implying he saw visions about the person visiting him just so that he can look surprised sometimes when he has visitors driving people crazy because they can’t tell what that means for them

summary: So I get were people are coming from when they say stuff like Bran actually could have children and push that. But allot of the...
question: So I get were people are coming from when they say stuff like Bran actually could have children and push that. But allot of the time it comes off very gross and demeaning to me as someone who is infertile due to my disability. It was confirmed in both book and show that he can’t. Erasing that part of his disability makes me feel like they are saying we should value him less because he can’t have kids. Bran doesn’t need to have kids to deserve to be king or be a good person.
answer: True. I guess D&D are so ableist we assumed they added that line out of ignorance. But you’re right.

reblog.comment: True. I guess D&D are so ableist we assumed they added that line out of ignorance. But you’re right.

trail.content_raw: True. I guess D&D are so ableist we assumed they added that line out of ignorance. But you’re right.
trail.content: True. I guess D&D are so ableist we assumed they added that line out of ignorance. But you’re right.
